title: U.S. Debates Whether a New Iran Deal Merits the Risks
sub_head: Critics say a restored nuclear accord would offer too few benefits for the U.S. and its allies
body:
Prospects for a new but diminished Iran nuclear deal are increasing, prompting debate in Washington about whether an accord merits the compromises involved.
Fitful negotiations on reviving the 2015 nuclear deal resumed in Vienna on Tuesday, with U.S. and Iranian officials saying an agreement could be within reach.
